Her mind is filled with living in the moment, and not preparing at all for things to come, making her an easy target to change if you can find it in your heart to transform such a sexy kitty dancer. With her tail flicking about, this slave to the music continue to dance for you and everyone else.

When you open your eyes again the world seems bigger some how, but you quickly realize that you shank by a few inches. You quickly cast a counter spell and change back, wondering what that spell was trying to do to you.

You giggle cutely as you shrink a bit more than last time. Your ears begin to feel oddly warm as they migrate to the top of your head, becoming triangular and covered in pink fur. They twitch to pick up soft sounds and the sudden increase of noise around you makes you snap out of your trance, quickly gathering your wits and changing yourself back to normal.
